title: 2 bd3 ba 1,140 sqft
description:
Beautiful & well-maintained twin located in the family-friendly neighborhood of East Mount Airy. This large landscaped corner home is appealing to the eye right from the start. Begin your tour on the shaded front porch with plenty of space for lounging with coffee in the morning. Open the door and you'll quickly notice the gorgeous, refinished hardwood floors that flow into the formal dining area. The eat-in kitchen offers a side entrance of home. The kitchen also boosts plenty of cabinets, a long countertop, and a great space for a refrigerator. As you continue onto the hallway, you will notice a hall closet, a full hall bathroom, linen closet, and two (2) terrific size bedrooms. The main bedroom is equipped with a full bathroom to include a sink, stand up shower, and toilet. The living space continues in the finished basement with outside access (side & rear), making it ideal for a personal gym, game room, or office space. There is also a full updated bathroom and bonus area prior to the rear door. Ample closet space through-out. Although the garage is off limit, there are 2 private parking spaces in the rear driveway of this beautiful home. Minutes to the Mt Airy train station, trendy eateries, and beautiful parks.

title: Spacious studio with a private terrace boasting magnificent city
description: Spacious studio with a private terrace boasting magnificent city views at The Dorchester on Rittenhouse Square! Enter Unit 1915A into a sun-drenched open living area with floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors that open to a private balcony perfect for relaxing with a good book or your morning cup of coffee. The open kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and wood cabinetry. A large dressing area/walk-in closet leads to the full bathroom offering a shower/tub and single vanity. Rent includes a twenty-four hour doorman and all utilities, including basic cable. Use of the building’s state-of-the-art fitness center, seasonal rooftop pool club, and valet parking in the building’s underground garage are available for an additional fee, subject to availability. No pets.

title: The award winning Phoenix offers premier cosmopolitan condo
description: The award winning Phoenix offers premier cosmopolitan condominium living. Minutes away from Rittenhouse Square & located in a cornerstone to Philadelphia's cultural district, this luxurious 1 bedroom + large den, 2 bath condo offers spectacular views over Ben Franklin Parkway. This beautiful condo features high ceilings, hardwood floors, 10 high hat ceiling lights with master control panel and dimmer to add extra light and ambiance, expansive windows & beautiful millwork with detailed wood baseboards. Fabulous gourmet kitchen with lustrous granite & stainless steel appliances opens to living room and dining area. Spacious bedroom and den with generous full baths. Laundry Room features newer Samsung Front Load Washer and Dryer with Storage bins beneath. The amenities in this historic building include a roof-top terrace, state of the art gym, direct access to Tir Na Nog Irish Bar & Grill and Starbucks, valet parking (extra fee), dry cleaning service, and 24-hour doorman. There is also Atrium access to Suburban Station Concourse, but, if you prefer to drive, on-premises valet parking is available for a daily fee. Don't miss this opportunity to enjoy the best of Philadelphia. Landlord prefers a 2 year lease!

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Wood Floors, Package Room
description:
The studio apartment home at 610 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. This home on the 6th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as June 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!

title: The space features high ceilings,
description: This FULLY FURNISHED studio apartment is filled with character, warmth and light. The space features high ceilings, surrounded by old world charm. Original moldings blend with custom built-ins, linens mix with natural wood, and light streams through the windows, creating a calm oasis. Historic character throughout includes gorgeous Jersey Ice Cream Co's signature plaster walls, original wood floors, ornate moldings and a non-working fireplace. Smartly designed kitchen with stone counters, gas range, Sub Zero refrigerator, and brass faucet. Vintage inspired bathroom features original tile, and a clawfoot tub for soaking. Private deck, perfect for al fresco meals and the blooming gardener. A beautiful spot for a full time residence or a sweet pied-a-terre. Walking distance to everything - Rittenhouse Square, Schuylkill River trail, restaurants, coffee shops, museums, shopping, universities and transportation. Located above the beloved Vernick restaurant.

title: Enjoy Logan Square convenience and contemporary
description: Enjoy Logan Square convenience and contemporary styling in this expansive two-bedroom, two-bathroom condominium with private outdoor space and parking in prime Center City. Spanning 1,264-square-feet, this lovely sun-splashed home invites you inside with a gracious tiled foyer lined by three extra-large closets. Ahead, the corner living room provides a generous footprint for seating and dining areas alongside southern and western exposures and a private balcony with iconic skyline views. Chefs will love the windowed eat-in kitchen featuring rows of wood cabinetry, granite counters, a breakfast bar, and a fleet of stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and built-in microwave. The desirable split-bedroom layout includes a serene primary suite with a large walk-in closet and an en suite bathroom. Near the entry, a spacious secondary bedroom offers easy access to the full guest bathroom. Three zoned HVAC and an in-unit washer-dryer add comfort and convenience. This rental includes a large storage unit and one assigned parking space. 2201 Cherry Street is a pet-friendly, elevator condominium in the centrally located Logan Square neighborhood, surrounded by the best of Philadelphia living. Enjoy fantastic shopping, dining, nightlife and entertainment venues in every direction. Visit the city's renowned Parkway Museum District institutions, or amble along the Schuylkill River Trail to Boathouse Row. You'll find Trader Joe's and GIANT nearby, while Penn, Drexel and Rittenhouse Square are just minutes from your door. The 22nd Street trolley station, SEPTA Suburban Station, 30th Street Station and Schuylkill Expressway are all within blocks, providing easy access to the rest of the city and beyond. *Photos are of a similar unit 1 floor above that is also for rent (MLS#PAPH2121796)*

title: Welcome to the Garden House at 973 North Leithgow.
description: Welcome to the Garden House at 973 North Leithgow. Walk through the painted metal door on North 4th street into the large, planted courtyard. Walk along the brick paths, sit under the grape vines growing over the pergola, enjoy dinner with friends on the patio overlooking the courtyard. Enter the front door of the home into a charming, light filled sunroom. This room features original parquet floors and an exposed brick wall. Beyond the sunroom is the recently updated kitchen with gorgeous countertops and backsplash, and terracotta flooring. Next to the kitchen lies the dining room, with large windows and hardwood floors. Here you will also find a coat closet and the door leading to the basement and laundry facilities. Ascend the staircase to the second floor where you will find two welcoming bedrooms with hardwood flooring, large closets and tons of natural light. The fully tiled bathroom sits between the bedrooms and offers ample room for storage. Come visit this fantastic property today as it won't last long!

title: Welcome to Locust Point.
description: Welcome to Locust Point. This building is safely centrally located to all that Philadelphia has to offer. In walking distance to the shops and restaurants of Rittenhouse, this unit sits in a prime location. To the west, sits the Schuylkill River Park, trail, and dog park for a bunch of fun outdoor activities. If you go just over the river, you have access to University City's sports leagues (soccer, baseball, flag football, frisbee, tennis) at Penn's Field. To the North, you have the Philadelphia Museum of Art and loads of other museums and galleries. Inside is a spacious loft with an in-unit washer and dryer. Perfect for city living, the ceilings are high, the windows are large, and there is plenty of space to unwind. The unit comes with a pre-installed tv wall mount, floating cabinet beneath tv, and dishwasher. Make sure to take advantage of the building's gym (free to all residents). While there is no on-site parking for this unit, there is a full-time, covered, secure parking garage available around the corner (less than 1-minute walk) for $200/month. Bike parking available. In addition to the closet space in the unit, there is additional private storage space on the same floor. Pets accepted on a case by case basis, with an additional $50/month fee. There is a fenced-in pet grass area in front of the building for exercise/bathroom activity.

title: Charming One Bedroom  Close To Train
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: This building is safely centrally located to all that Philadelphia
description: Welcome to Locust Point. This building is safely centrally located to all that Philadelphia has to offer. In walking distance to the shops and restaurants of Rittenhouse, this unit sits in a prime location. To the west, sits the Schuylkill River Park, trail, and dog park for a bunch of fun outdoor activities. If you go just over the river, you have access to University City's sports leagues (soccer, baseball, flag football, frisbee, tennis) at Penn's Field. To the North, you have the Philadelphia Museum of Art and loads of other museums and galleries. Inside is a spacious loft with an in-unit washer and dryer. Perfect for city living, the ceilings are high, the windows are large, and there is plenty of space to unwind. The unit comes with a pre-installed tv wall mount, floating cabinet beneath tv, and dishwasher. Make sure to take advantage of the building's gym (free to all residents). While there is no on-site parking for this unit, there is a full-time, covered, secure parking garage available around the corner (less than 1-minute walk) for $200/month. Bike parking available. In addition to the closet space in the unit, there is additional private storage space on the same floor. Pets accepted on a case by case basis, with an additional $50/month fee. There is a fenced-in pet grass area in front of the building for exercise/bathroom activity.
